Need Help Now? Dial or text 988 or chat online

988: We Hear You

If you or someone you know needs emotional support – we hear you. Call or text 988 or chat online for the direct connection you need now.

  • Start a Chat

New York 988

The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline connects you to trained crisis counselors 24/7. They can help anyone thinking about suicide, struggling with substance use, experiencing a mental health crisis, or any other kind of emotional distress. You can also call, text or chat 988 if you are worried about someone you care about who may need crisis support.

What is 988?

The 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline connects you with trained mental health counselors. It's free, confidential, and available 24/7.

Spread the Word

Sharing information about 988 is an important way to take part in preventing suicide, helping others in crisis, and changing the conversation around seeking help. It’s time to talk about it.

988 By the Numbers

New York State has dedicated 988 contact centers for people experiencing a mental health crisis. Your local contact center serves your entire community 24/7 for free. These centers will connect you to providers in the community that will support your needs.

  • 15

    New York 988 Contact Centers

  • 420,123

    Calls Answered by New York 988

  • 58,660

    Texts and chats answered by New York 988

Based on call, text and chat volume since July 2022
